1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Ishaq:There is a similar report (as no. 1I8) narrated via Abu Ishaq

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْجُنُبِ يَنَامُ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَغْتَسِلَ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About The Person Who Is Junub Sleeping Before performing Ghusl
